last_episode_to_air.name: “Checkered flag time”
last_episode_to_air.overview: Colton makes his first professional appearance since the crash. Rylee is sent on a scavenger hunt.

name: Driven
overview: A resilient girl with a tragic past and a heart of gold falls in love with a bad boy race car driver.
tagline: Fueled with desire. Crashing into love.

episodes.name: "I sigh into the welcoming silence..."
episodes.overview: Colton Donavan lives on that razor-thin edge toward out of control. Whether it's on the track or off of it, everything he wants is at his fingertips: success, willing women, media attention. Everything that is, but Rylee. She's the exception this reckless bad boy can't seem to win over. Her heart is healing. His soul is damaged. They both know the two of them could never work. But he crashes into her life without apology-disrupting her world, testing her boundaries, and uncovering the darkness of her past. Their chemistry is undeniable. Their attraction is magnetic. Their ability to help each other heal obvious. And even though he won't let her in, there's something about Colton she can't walk away from. This is the beginning of their story. Their fight. Their perfectly imperfect love.

episodes.name: "Decide, Rylee. Yes. Or No."

episodes.name: "Don't think, Baby. Just feel."
episodes.overview: Rylee, Colton, Haddie and Becks head to Las Vegas. Rylee asks Colton to try.

episodes.name: “For the chance to be with you, I’m willing to take the risk.”
episodes.overview: Rylee opens up more about Max and the consequences of the accident. Quinlan pays Rylee a visit. Colton asks Andy about his mother. Rylee and Colton attend a gala together.

episodes.name: "Quack!"
episodes.overview: Rylee shares her insecurities over Tawny with Colton. Colton shuts down when Rylee lets her feelings slip unexpectedly. Rylee is shocked when she goes to see Colton and he isn’t alone.

episodes.name: "That's one checkered flag I'm definitely claiming."
episodes.overview: On the season finale, Haddie urges Rylee to hear Colton out. Rylee and Colton head to St. Petersburg, FL. Becks grows frustrated with Rylee and Colton and tells them to fix things. It’s race day for Colton.

episodes.name: "Thwack, Thwack, Thwack"
episodes.overview: Everyone rallies around Colton at the hospital as he fights for his life.

episodes.name: “Nothing between us but sheets”
episodes.overview: Becks tells Rylee Colton needs to get back on the track. Colton finally learns the meaning of ACE. Tawny shows up with shocking news.

episodes.name: “Hurting is feeling and feeling is living”
episodes.overview: Zander tells the court what his father did to his mother. Colton gets back on the track. Zander’s father shows up at the boys’ home.

episodes.name: “Life isn’t about how you survive the storm…”
episodes.overview: Colton and Rylee face the paparazzi head on. Rylee suffers a medical emergency.

episodes.name: “I’m seeing the alphabet in a whole new light these days”
episodes.overview: Colton opens up to Rylee about his past. The boys go to Colton’s for a pool party.

episodes.name: “Checkered flag time”
episodes.overview: Colton makes his first professional appearance since the crash. Rylee is sent on a scavenger hunt.
